name: ArtifactoryConan
description: This task runs a Conan command.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: conanCommand
inputs.label: Conan Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The conan command to be run by this task.

inputs.name: remoteName
inputs.label: Conan Remote Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias that can be used to reference this Conan remote repository.

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory Service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service used by this remote configuration.

inputs.name: conanRepo
inputs.label: Conan Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Conan repository used by this remote configuration.

inputs.name: purgeExistingRemotes
inputs.label: Purge Existing Remotes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Purge existing remotes before adding this new one.

inputs.name: configSourceType
inputs.label: Source Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source type of the configuration file to use.

inputs.name: configZipPath
inputs.label: Zip File location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path or URL to configuration zip file to be installed.

inputs.name: configInstallGit
inputs.label: Git Repository URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to configuration on Git to be installed.

inputs.name: pathOrReference
inputs.label: Path or Reference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a folder containing a recipe (conanfile.py or conanfile.txt) or to a recipe file. e.g., ./my_project/conanfile.txt. It could also be a reference.

inputs.name: patternOrReference
inputs.label: Pattern or Reference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern or package recipe reference, e.g., boost/*, MyPackage/1.2@user/channel.

inputs.name: createPath
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a folder containing a conanfile.py or to a recipe file e.g., my_folder/conanfile.py.

inputs.name: createReference
inputs.label: Reference
inputs.helpMarkDown: user/channel or pkg/version@user/channel (if name and version not declared in conanfile.py) where the package will be created.

inputs.name: extraArguments
inputs.label: Conan arguments and options
inputs.visibleRule: conanCommand = Config Install || conanCommand = Install || conanCommand = Upload || conanCommand = Create
inputs.helpMarkDown: Conan command extra arguments and options.

inputs.name: customArguments
inputs.label: Conan command to execute
inputs.helpMarkDown: Conan command with options and arguments.

inputs.name: collectBuildInfo
inputs.label: Collect build info
inputs.visibleRule: conanCommand = Install || conanCommand = Upload || conanCommand = Create || conanCommand = Custom

inputs.name: conanUserHome
inputs.label: Conan User Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: Conan User Home folder location. The default values for build and release pipelines are $(Agent.WorkFolder)/$(System.DefinitionId)/$(Build.BuildId) and $(Agent.WorkFolder)/$(Build.DefinitionId)/$(Build.BuildId) respectively.
